main_topic.author: Jainam213
main_topic.title: Is this only limited to places?
main_topic.content: Up till now all interactions seem to be limited to locations. In the private set are we just limited to locations or can the word be anything at all ?  Are the categories provided somehow?

comments.author: Bovard Doerschuk-Tiberi
comments.content:
Keywords will be limited to person, place or thing. 

The categories are provided to the answering agent to resolve any ambiguity in the keyword. For example "orange" the fruit vs "orange" the color (which color is more of a concept than a thing, so it wouldn't be included anyway).

reply.author: Jainam213Topic Author
reply.date: Posted 2 months ago  ·  330th in this Competition
